title: No. 55, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature

 LRC, in the plate: [A.L. De Lalive Sculp.]
description: young woman wearing a draped garment and holding a bird under her proper L arm and a snake-twined stick in her proper R hand, stands on a short column; pair of putti hang a swag above a coat of arms, LLC; inscription at base of column
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
